mapper.insert: insert into estimate ( estimateTitle, contactNo, name, price_kr, validity, deliveryDate, deliveryPlace, paymentType, constructionDate, contentList, total, title, regDate, regNm ) values ( #{estimateTitle}, #{contactNo}, #{name}, #{price_kr}, #{validity}, #{deliveryDate}, #{deliveryPlace}, #{paymentType}, #{constructionDate}, #{contents}, #{total}, #{title}, now(), '관리자' )
mapper.select: select no, estimateTitle, constructionDate from estimate where delyn = 'n' and contactNo = #{contactNo} and constructionDate = #{constructionDate}

select no, contactNo, estimateTitle, name, price_kr, validity, deliveryDate, deliveryPlace, paymentType, constructionDate, contentList, title, total, regDate from estimate where delyn = 'n' and no = #{no}
mapper.update: update estimate set delyn='y' where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into images ( type, contactNo, readNo, realNm, virtualNm, regDate ) values ( #{type}, #{contactNo}, (SELECT no FROM estimate order by no desc limit 1), #{realNm}, #{virtualNm}, now() )
mapper.select: select no, virtualNm from images where type = 'e' and readNo = #{no}
mapper.update: update estimate set estimateTitle=#{estimateTitle}, price_kr=#{price_kr}, validity=#{validity}, deliveryDate=#{deliveryDate}, deliveryPlace=#{deliveryPlace}, paymentType=#{paymentType}, contentList=#{contents}, title=#{title}, total=#{total}, modDate =now() where no = #{no}
